Posts.Content: So glad about your results! I saw my oncologist yesterday and even though I was negative on the lymph nodes she still says I will need chemo. Whatever it takes I will do to eradicate this disease. My chemo starts the 13th of Oct for 16 months (8 treatments). I go today for a Petscan and next week for a heart test. So many appts!!!! Be sure and let me know what you find out, I will keep you in my prayers, Debbie
Posts.Title: Update-Good news

Posts.Content: Mine was a 3, she did'nt say anything about what stage, just that it was an aggresive cancer.
Posts.Title: Update-Good news

Posts.Content: Linda, my prayers will be for you hoping to get through this next step. Keep the positive attitude, it helps. My next step is chemo which starts on Oct 13th. Keep the strength and remember you have alot of people praying for you. Hugs galore, Debbie
Posts.Title: Next step in my journey
